data.name: AdminName
data.value: Enter the name of the super user

data.name: BoardName
data.value: Enter the name of the new Board

data.name: ConnectionExistDesc
data.value: Select SQL Server Database Connection String:

data.name: ConnectionNewNote
data.value: Connection String will be saved as

data.name: CreatePasswordText
data.value: Since this is the first time you install or upgrade this version of the forum, you need to create a configuration password for security.

data.name: DataSource
data.value: Enter the Data Source (Name or address of the sql server)

data.name: DuplicateEmail
data.value: A username for that e-mail address already exists. Please enter a different e-mail address.

data.name: DuplicateUserName
data.value: Username already exists. Please enter a different user name.

data.name: EnterConfigPasswordDesc
data.value: Enter the configuration password to upgrade or manually install the forum.

data.name: ErrorBoardName
data.value: You must enter a Board name.

data.name: ErrorConfigPassword
data.value: You must update your appSettings with the YAF.ConfigPassword Key to continue. NOTE: The key name is case sensitive.

data.name: ErrorForumEmail
data.value: You must enter a Board email address.

data.name: ErrorUserEmail
data.value: You must enter the super user email address.

data.name: ErrorUserName
data.value: You must enter the super user user name,

data.name: ErrorUserNotFound
data.value: Existing user name is invalid and does not represent a current user in the membership store.

data.name: ExistingUserName
data.value: Enter the name of the existing user to make super user (host)

data.name: FinishDesc
data.value: Clicking Finish will take you to the Forum main page.

data.name: InitFinish
data.value: Your forum is now been ready.

data.name: InvalidAnswer
data.value: The password retrieval answer provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: InvalidEmail
data.value: The e-mail address provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: InvalidPassword
data.value: The password provided is invalid. Please enter a valid password value.

data.name: InvalidQuestion
data.value: The password retrieval question provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: InvalidUserName
data.value: The user name provided is invalid. Please check the value and try again.

data.name: MailTestDesc
data.value: Sends a test Message to the Email address that is defined as Send to address

data.name: ManuallyPassword
data.value: No Write Access to App Settings

data.name: ManuallyPasswordError
data.value: Unable to modify your config file to write the installation password due to a permission issue.

data.name: MigrateCount
data.value: user(s) found in your forum database.

data.name: MigrateDesc
data.value: Click "Next" to start the upgrade (migration) of all roles and users from your old Yet Another Forum.NET database to the .NET Provider Model.

data.name: MigrateNote
data.value: The migration task can take a very long time depending on how many users are in your forum.

data.name: MigrateUsersText
data.value: Please do not navigate away from this page while the migration is in progress. It can take a very long time to perform the migration.

data.name: NextInitDb
data.value: Clicking "Next" will initialize your database to the latest version.

data.name: NextUpgradeDb
data.value: Clicking "Next" will upgrade your database to the latest version.

data.name: NoWriteAppSettingsNote
data.value: Unable to modify your config file to set Database Connection due to no write permission.

data.name: NoWriteConnSettings
data.value: No Write Access to Database Connection Strings

data.name: NoWriteConnSettingsNote
data.value: Unable to modify your config file to set Database Connection string due to no write permission.

data.name: OpenFileDesc
data.value: file in the application root directory and add/update the following key in the <AppSettings> section:

data.name: OpenFileDesc2
data.value: file in the application root directory and add/update the following key in the <connectionStrings> section:

data.name: PasswordFile
data.value: This password is stored with your appSettings in the file...

data.name: PasswordNoMatch
data.value: Verification is not the same as your password.

data.name: PermissionApp
data.value: YAF.NET Has Write Access to Root Application Directory ("~/") ...

data.name: PermissionUpload
data.value: YAF.NET Has Write Access to "~/Upload" directory ...

data.name: ProviderError
data.value: The authentication provider returned an error. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.

data.name: SecurityAnswer
data.value: The answer to the security question

data.name: SecurityQuestion
data.value: The question you will be asked when you need to retrieve your lost password

data.name: SmtpTestBody
data.value: The email sending appears to be working from your YAF installation.

data.name: SmtpTestSubject
data.value: Test Email From Yet Another Forum.NET

data.name: SmtpTestSuccess
data.value: Mail Sent. Verify it's received at your entered email address.

data.name: TestSettingsDesc
data.value: Click the "Previous" button to edit the database configuration.

data.name: TestSettingsText
data.value: You may want to test your YAF configuration settings here before proceeding.

data.name: UnknownError
data.value: An unknown error occurred. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.

data.name: UpgradeExtensions
data.value: Upgrade BBCode Extensions and Spam Words

data.name: UpgradeFinish
data.value: Your forum has now been upgraded to the latest version.

data.name: UpgradeNote
data.value: If this is an upgrade, please enter the configuration password you created when the forum was first installed, not the admin user password.

data.name: UserRejected
data.value: The user creation request has been canceled. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact your system administrator.

data.name: ValidatePermissionDesc
data.value: YetAnotherForum.NET Installation is easier when the Application has write access to your .config files.

data.name: ValidatePermissionText
data.value: Click below to test if permissions are correct. If they are not, you can still use the installation wizard.

data.name: WarningUpgrade
data.value:
You are about to upgrade YAF.NET to the most recent version. Before proceeding with upgrade process please ensure that...
  • you created a backup of your existing installation

data.name: WelcomeInstallDesc
data.value: Click "Next" to start the Install process.

data.name: WelcomeInstallText
data.value: This Installer will guide you through the steps required to Install YetAnotherForum.NET (YAF.NET).

data.name: WelcomeUpgrade
data.value: Welcome to the YAF.NET Upgrade Process

data.name: WelcomeUpgradeDesc
data.value: Click "Next" to start the Upgrade process.
